metadata.title: CVE-2024-38591 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix deadlock on SRQ async events. xa_lock for SRQ table may berequired in AEQ. Use xa_store_irq()/ xa_erase_irq() to avoid deadlock.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
